original_title: Biệt động Sài Gòn: Cơn giông
overview: After the dangerous offensive launched on the embassy office in Saigon, Tư Chung and his comrades have to find ways to adapt to rising suspicions from the CIA advisors, as well as dealing with violent repercussions involving someone very dear to him. The third part of a series based on a real-life organization involved in intelligence activities in South Vietnam before 1975.
tagline: MAY THIS BOMB EXPLODE OVER OUR ENEMY'S HEAD!
title: Saigon Rangers: Thunderstorm
